casebody.data:
In the Matter of Maurice GROSS, Trading as PARAMOUNT SALES CORPORATION, Bankrupt. August G. Klages, as Trustee, etc., Appellant. No. 460. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. June 8, 1933. Isador Goetz, of New York City, for appellant. Gordon & Young, of New York City, for appellee.

Before L. HAND, AUGUSTUS N. HAND, and CEASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Order affirmed in open court.
